resources.string: This is the now playing activity. By clicking the different birds in the birds list, the now playing activity opens up and starts playing that bird\'s song.
On this screen, there is a list of all the birds with a picture. You can click on these to go to the \'now playing\' screen using an explicit intent
Welcome to Birdify. This is an app where you can listen to your favorite bird songs/sounds and search for new ones. On the home page it is also possible to see the most popular bird songs.
In the search menu you can be able to search for different birds you want to hear
